faqs.question: What documentation is required to purchase a resale 2BHK flat in this locality
faqs.answer: To purchase a resale 2BHK flat key documents typically include the original Sale Deed Chain of documents showing previous ownership No Objection Certificates NOCs from the housing society or RWA if applicable approved building plans and up-to-date tax receipts.
